meanings.definition: To pay someone for work done
meanings.sent1: The company remunerates its employees with fair wages.
meanings.sent2: She remunerates the gardener for taking care of the plants.
meanings.sent3: The generous boss remunerates the hardworking staff with bonuses.
meanings.sent4: Hard work remunerates like seeds growing into fruitful trees.
meanings.sent5: The act of remunerating ensures a mutually beneficial relationship between employer and employee.

meanings.sent1: The hotel remunerates guests for any inconveniences during their stay.
meanings.sent2: The insurance company remunerates policyholders for valid claims.
meanings.sent3: The magician jokingly remunerates the audience with imaginary coins.
meanings.sent4: Kindness remunerates the heart with warmth beyond measure.
meanings.sent5: A smile can remunerate more than words in some situations.
